data.title: Austin & College Station, Texas
data.meta_description: Premiere Events offers a variety of Tent, Wedding, and Event Rentals in Austin, College Station, and Central Texas! Contact us today!
data.text:
You deserve an outstanding event-rental experience. No matter the occasion, Premiere Events is here to help. For more than two decades, Premiere Events has served neighborhoods where we live and work, including Austin, Bryan/College Station, The Woodlands / Montgomery County, Central Texas and points beyond — all with distinction. From places as distant as Carrollton, Laredo, Alpine, Fredericksburg and Horseshoe Bay, or as close as Bastrop, Smithville, Lagrange and Giddings to Georgetown, Round Rock and Round Top, we can deliver the goods, and pick them up too.

Our diverse and impressive rental inventory; customer-focused approach, and personal, caring service sets Premiere apart. Whatever you need, wherever in Texas you need it, you can rely on the Premiere Promise: “Exceptional Value and Unparalleled Customer Service.”

This site presents our rental products and services. It features our rental options in use at stunning weddings and amazing events – images that will inspire and delight you. We invite you to take your time, explore your rental alternatives, and enjoy this virtual showroom. Gather information that will help you make wise rental choices and informed event decisions. Then, utilize our online chat feature, give us a call, schedule a showroom appointment, shoot us an email, or reach out for a Zoom meet-up today. Let’s get started on your event journey! There’s no time like the present and nothing to be gained by waiting. The early bird gets their rental needs met!

Premiere Events is one of Texas’ largest independently owned, family operated tent and event rental companies. With 4 ideally located central Texas showrooms, whichever Premiere destination you choose, you’ll be graciously welcomed and warmly received. Within easy reach of most major Texas population centers and many larger Texas towns and cities, you’ll find well-appointed Premiere showrooms, filled with exciting rental selections, brimming with Texas Hospitality. We invite you to virtually visit one or all of our 4 locations and to be our guest, at the Premiere location that can serve you best. As the leading provider of exciting wedding rental selections and unparalleled event rental support, it’s clear that weddings move and inspire us. To us, Love is Love, and whatever its form, it’s a Beautiful Thing. We celebrate all loving relationships that bring people together, and support all wedding couples throughout our communities. We’re huge fans of socials and celebrations where people share laughter and find joy. From birthdays, to anniversaries, to graduations and more, Premiere will bring the basics you need to the party, and provide the ‘frills’ you want to help realize your event dreams. If on the other hand, you’re wanting to ‘get down to business’, we can handle your wants and needs equally well. We’re in business too, and we know you’re looking for the best rental and event value, and we’re proud to say that Premiere is that best-value option.

At Premiere, our industry experience, proven expertise, rental product offerings, and friendly, helpful support makes life easier for event planners, meeting planners and destination management companies. We respect your knowledge, understand your role, and value your time. We’re professionals just like you, and are keenly aware that you, along with your clients and customer, and driven by success. We will not

disappoint! We generously support companies and organizations who work in the events community. Premiere supports the broader community too, and is a generous contributor, especially to causes involving children. We love our furry family members, and value opportunities to support them as well. We welcome the opportunity to serve and look forward to meeting you.

Delores Crum, Co-Founder / President Richard Crum, Co-Founder

Angela Nussel, VP, Administration

Rick Crum, VP, Operations

Thanks for visiting this site and considering Premiere Events as your rental provider. We’ve created this virtual showroom for your convenience. We hope that you find the information presented here helpful and easy to use. You’re able to view your rental options and explore rental alternatives that fit your style and work within your budget. By clicking on the items that interest you, you can create a Wish List and view item-by-item pricing.

What you can’t do at PremiereEventsOnline.com is place a rental order. Any day, any time, you can view our rental products and services on this site, but placing an order and working directly with us takes a phone call, an email, a virtual interaction, or a visit to a Premiere Events showroom.

Our phones are answered and our online chat feature is live during store hours: Monday-Friday 9:00 am to 5:00 pm and Saturday, by appointment only, from 9:00 am to noon.. We’ll generally respond to emailed “Contact Us” forms on the same or the very next business day. In peak demand seasons, you’ll receive a delay notice when needed. Members of the Premiere Events team are happy to prepare a quote for your rental selections. If you’d like to schedule a showroom appointment, we’ll gladly set aside a time to chat with you. Making special advance arrangements to visit during showroom hours ensures you’ll have our undivided attention. You’re welcome to browse with no preset appointment time, but please be prepared to wait patiently while we conduct business with our scheduled guests. We’ll get to you as soon as we can!

The Rental process begins with a quote (when you’re not quite sure what you’ll be needing or aren’t ready to make a commitment) or an order (when you’re ready to reserve your rental selections to ensure their availability for your use). Reservations require a 50% deposit, but you will be able to make changes to your order, including cancellation without penalty, subject to the terms and conditions of our easy-to-read, simple to understand Rental Reservation Agreement.

At Premiere, we’re here to help. When you’re in a hurry, know exactly what you want, and are familiar with the rental process . . . no problem. Our friendly team members will be quick and efficient. When you don’t have a clue about the choices, aren’t at all certain of what you want, or are a first-time renter . . . no problem. Our team members are rental and event experts! We’ll take all the time you need to explain your options and explore your rental alternatives.

You can count on Premiere for an outstanding rental experience delivered by caring professionals committed to your satisfaction. Our goal is to make your rental journey simple and enjoyable. Premiere’s diverse selection of quality event rental products is available at every point along the budgetary spectrum. We operate with full disclosure and total transparency, so you can be completely confident in your dealings with Premiere. There are no hidden fees or unpleasant surprises. Call or email us today to learn more about Doing Business with Premiere. You’ll be glad you did.

Premiere is one of the largest, most experienced, and best equipped event rental companies in our markets. Our service is second to none! Over the years, Premiere Events has evolved into a recognized and award-winning event rental products and services provider. Premiere’s original 12,000 square foot South Austin location has morphed into more than 100,000 square feet of showroom and warehouse space throughout our service area. Premiere’s planned 40,000 square foot South Austin expansion plan is slated to commence before our 25th birthday in 2025. We enjoy the distinction of being the only Austin rental provider with two Austin showrooms. Our clients and customers can choose between Bryan/College Station (South CS), North Austin (Domain area), and South Austin (Menchaca) – a big plus when considering Austin’s infamous traffic woes.

In 2016, Premiere acquired Party Time Rentals, headquartered in the Bryan-College Station community. An integral part of Brazos Valley’s event scene for 5 decades, in July of 2022, Party Time was rebranded and took on the Premiere Events name. Premiere’s Bryan-College station operation honors the Party Time legacy while incorporating Premiere Events signature service and impressive inventory collection.

Our newest venture, Premiere Events Woodlands-Montgomery County (W-MC), is building relationships with The Woodlands, Conroe, Willis, Huntsville, Magnolia, and Montgomery, as well as with Sam Houston State’s Huntsville campus. We’ll soon have a showroom in W-MC too!! We look forward to the next growth opportunity, be that a new product line to carry, a new service to offer, or a new area to serve in this great state.

From a family business with 3 front of house and 8 back of house employees. Premiere’s workforce is now over 100 team members strong. While many similarly sized and situated event rental providers have become part of the institutional investor scene, Premiere is proud to remain family owned and family operated. Whether or not we’re related by blood or by marriage, we’re all family here at Premiere – all building a legacy for Premiere’s bright future.

Premiere Events can provide the rental items you need to celebrate any event or occasion. Whether you’re planning a Wedding, Anniversary, Graduation, Tailgate, Birthday, Quince’, Bar or Bat Mitzvah . . . we’ve got all your social events covered! If your company is celebrating an opening, cheering your team and its success, hosting a client appreciation event, holding a conference, or participating in a trade show . . . Premiere is your company / corporate celebration headquarters! When your not-for-profit group, church, or school needs help with a Fundraiser, Gala, Volunteer Appreciation event, Prom, School Dance, Awards Program . . . Premiere has the rental support you need and ideas you’ll appreciate. What we do best at Premiere Events is build relationships. Every event is important, but every customer is priceless. We look forward to being of service.

Need help with space planning or event décor and design? We specialize in preparing CAD layouts that will help maximize your space and enhance your guests’ experience. Premiere also has access to award-winning creative minds (throughout the state and across the nation) who can tap into your vision (or your Pinterest board) and help create a unique event experience.

You can always find basic tables and chairs at Premiere Events. But there’s so much more! Use elegant Chiavari chairs, sleek and stylish ghost chairs, or classic garden chairs to make a sophisticated event statement. Make your event truly memorable with Premiere’s stunning linens and impressive table-top (dishware, glassware, and flatware) offerings. Our table-top selection includes the latest styles, colors, and patterns – – – all designed to wow your guests. Premiere Events also has tents galore . . . for shade in spring and summer and a dry environment in winter and fall . . . for every group, no matter how large or small. And we can help create every tented environment from simply comfortable to stunningly sophisticated. We have catering and food service support products from portable bars to chafers . . . stoves and ovens to fryers and grills. Premiere has pipe and drape, concession support (popcorn, cotton candy and snow cone machines), and climate control options. Our exciting event furniture helps create fun and functional lounge spaces for virtually any social occasion, or graces the stage for a professional company presentation or panel discussion.

If you can’t find exactly what you’re looking for at Premiere Events, chances are we know where to source it. Ask us about a “special order” or inquire about having various event elements (linens, carpets, backdrops, etc.) customized just for you. We’re also well connected in the events community and are happy to recommend the best event professionals for catering, baking, lighting, AV support, floral artistry, photography, entertainment and other ancillary services that will help make your event the talk of the town.
